name: Moe Moe Maid: Pickup Disaster
description:
Play as an overworked maid rumba! Avoid doing any more tasks for the day, or you'll power down!

Move Left & Right = A (Left) & D (Right)

Dash = Space bar

The project was made with the help of...

Make Your First 2D Game with Unity & C# - Beginner Course

and music by DOVA-SYNDROME
